body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Justin Stewart and I represent Apex Auto Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Justin. My name is Kathryn Price.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathryn. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is kathryn.price@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Now, may I have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My phone number is seven seven zero - one two three - four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you for sharing that information, Kathryn. Should you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you, Justin. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathryn. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day.
